title: Mother Teresa's charity in India is blocked from receiving foreign funding
content:
1. Mother Teresa's charity in India is blocked from receiving foreign funding  NPR
  2. India Cuts Off Foreign Funding of Mother Teresa’s Charity  The New York Times
